title: Ecommerce / Online Product Preventing Nail Biting
text: Questions Business Summary This Online Retail Store offers a unique all natural paraben free product used to help people stop biting their nails. This product is safe for young kids to adults. Established in 1999 by current owners husband whom passed away in 2012. As a result the business has been on auto pilot ever since. Sales in 2012 were $241,480 with an owner benefit of $95,500 when the company was heavily marketing. The product and domain name are there. All this needs business needs is someone to start marketing / advertising, the website has recently been redesigned to help grow this business back to its former glory days. Product is very easily produced and shipped and business includes client list database (15,000+) along with some equipment to manufacture product if desired. Very simple business and it can be easily relocatable to anywhere in the world. Asking $95,000 with $45,000 Down - Seller will accept $75,000 Cash. Call Sunbelt Business Brokers of Orlando and Franco Ferrari for more information ~ 407-960-7390! Financials
